projects.title: Advent of Code
projects.description: Engaged in daily coding challenges throughout December, enhancing problem-solving and programming skills by devising solutions to diverse and complex problems, fostering a consistent learning and development routine.

projects.title: Carpooling for Future
projects.description: Aimed at revolutionizing the Dutch mobility landscape by integrating private carpooling into the broader public transport system, enhancing accessibility and sustainability, and focusing on user experience design to facilitate adoption.

projects.title: Safe grocery shopping
projects.description: Addressed the urgent need to minimize in-store customer density during the pandemic, focusing on public health safety in the retail sector by designing solutions that balanced accessibility with safety protocols.

projects.title: Gamified Learning
projects.description: Created an EduTech solution named Challengly to engage and motivate elementary and middle school students during remote learning periods, employing gamification strategies to enhance educational experiences and outcomes.

projects.title: 5G in autonomous trains
projects.description: Envisioned the application of low-latency 5G technology to improve in-train passenger communication and safety in autonomous trains, including innovative solutions for environmental hazard detection like leaves on tracks.

projects.title: DB Rad+, Rad-Daten-Hackathon Hamburg
projects.description: Proposed a novel, data-centric enhancement for the DB Rad+ app, aiming to incentivize everyday cycling and improve the cycling experience in urban environments through the integration of user data and engagement features.
